Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Claws^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 不久前，可恶的科学发展部升级了他们的变种战士。它们必须被找出来踩死！杀死一名^orange;猿族收割者^reset;，你会得到奖励。
Texts.Eng: Not long ago, the abominable Miniknog perfected a warrior variant of their genome. It must be stamped out! Kill one of the ^orange;Apex War-Born^reset; and you'll be rewarded.

Texts.Chs: 倒下了一个...还有千千万万个。但这只是个开始，如果你再遇见他们...请结束他们痛苦的一生
Texts.Eng: One down...thousands to go. But it's a start. If you see any more...end their suffering.
